derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin hypotenusa from Greek hupoteinousa (grammē) 'subtending (line'), from the verb hupoteinein (from hupo 'under' + teinein 'stretch')

entry.def: The hypotenuse of a right-angled triangle is the side opposite its right angle.

means.word_mean: 1. the side of a right triangle opposite the right angle

stems_affixes.word_buile: hypo在……下面,次等+derm皮+ic……的→adj.皮下的
hypo在……下面,次等+crit评判+e→在背后评判→伪君子
hypo在……下面,次等+mnes记忆+ia病→记忆变得不好
hypo在……下面,次等+tension压力[引申血压]→n.血压过低
hypo在……下面,次等+tenus边→[从上面拉到]下面→斜边
hypo在……下面,次等+thesis论文→还不是正式的理论→假说
hypo在……下面,次等+trophy营养→营养不够→[导致]发育不良
hypo在……下面,次等+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症
